scripts.start: rimraf dist && nodemon --watch ./src --exec 'prettier --write "src/**/*.@(js|json|graphql)" && babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/schema.graphql dist/ && copyfiles .env dist/ && NODE_ENV=development TZ=utc node dist/bin'
scripts.start:prod: rimraf dist && babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/schema.graphql dist/ && copyfiles .env dist/ && NODE_ENV=production TZ=utc node dist/bin
